component.heading: Personal information
component.description: Below is all the information fetched as per your Aadhar and PAN. We will use the same information to open your account.

item.value: Your gender will be stored as ‘transgender’ with us. However, it will be submitted to third-parties as ‘male’ since certain regulatory bodies only support male and female options at the moment. But don’t worry, things will change for the better. Till then —keep slaying it, queen!
Is your mother’s maiden name is same as your mother’s name
Note: Your permanent address will also serve as the correspondence address by default.

item.heading: What is maiden name?
item.decription: A maiden name is the surname or birth name a woman has before she marries and takes her husband’s last name.

item.heading: transgender
item.decription: Following regulatory bodies doesn’t support for transgender
item.value:
BSE - For mutual fund transaction

CVL - For KRA KYC
